div.p: The terminal explosion risk describes the probability that the metapopulation abundance will end up above a specific threshold at the end of the simulations. The different scenarios are as follows: (a) Low initial population size, mean survival. (b) High initial population size, mean survival. (c) Low initial population size, high survival. (d) High initial population size, high survival. (e) Low initial population size, low survival. (f) High initial population size, low survival
